parameters.definition: Number of days in recurring period
The number of users on the nth day
Number of consecutive working days before a resting period

description: To operate a cafeteria, the manager must ensure on-call duty based on the statistics on the required staff. For the future days, we know the number of desired employees on each day. If each employee works a fixed number of days in a row followed by a fixed number of days off, calculate the minimum number of employees to hire. Assume a recurring schedule.
